channel.title: [639] Drops On Death
channel.description:
Hey there. So basically I just want to make it when you kill a player, it add's a certain item to your inventory. I've got the basics, just need to know where to put it.
Been looking through all my isDead() methods and my victim.isDead() methods and can't seem to find an appropriate place to put it?
[CODE] player.sendMessage(0, "You have been awarded 10 PvP tokens!"); player.getInventory().addItem(ITEM ID, 10);[/CODE]

item.title: [639] Drops On Death
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Lol I Already figured it out I was just adding it in the incorrect location. I added a lastKiller() void for it to call as
lp.getInventory().addItem(“item, int)”
and added it in my sendDead() Method in skills.java

Read full topic
